email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Would you be able to come down to the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concerns about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $48.50 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.50 sounds more reasonable. However, we’d like to push for $47.00 if possible. Also, can we confirm the laycan remains 15-20 October? Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I appreciate your counteroffer. After further negotiation, the owner has agreed to $47.25 per metric ton. The laycan is confirmed for 15-20 October. Please let me know if we can proceed with this. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $47.25 works for us. Let’s proceed with the fixture. Please send over the recap for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Fixture Recap for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great news! Attached is the fixture recap for your review. The key terms are: Freight rate $47.25/MT, laycan 15-20 October, demurrage $20,000/day. Let me know if everything looks good. Best, Sarah
